'Arise!' is the title of a studio album originally released on vinyl by Amebix
in 1985. The album was released on CD in 1995 and in 2000 remastered and re-
released on CD/LP as 'Arise +2' with the Right to Ride demo included as two
bonus tracks. On the vinyl version these were included as a bonus 7". The band
Fear of God is named after the third track.

"The Moor" is based upon "Requiem" by GyÃ¶rgy Ligeti, famously used in the Lunar
monolith sequence in [[2001: A Space Odyssey]]. "Largactyl" is a misspelled
version of the proprietary name for the antipsychotic medication chlorpromazine
(Largactil).
